description:
The official app for Globe Soccer Awards.
Celebrities and prestigious nominees from the football world will once again attend the yearly event.

Also, don’t forget to tune in for the streaming video, live from the Awards gala.

The official app allows to:
- Vote for your favourite football stars
- Predict scores from the major leagues
- Keep track of the nominees and winners
- Get directions to the Event venue
- Explore the photo gallery and previous editions' Awards

"Yalla Shoot" - A specialized app for providing comprehensive details of football matches, including real-time match tracking.

1 - Match schedule with customized views.
2 - Latest football news through our exclusive coverage.
3 - The lineup with a live rating of the players
4 - Live teams and players ranking.
5 - A profile for each player contains statistics and information.
6 - Real-time statistics during matches.

And many, many more features.

The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.  

Key features: 
•	Exclusive content – Access behind-the-scenes footage of Jude’s life away from the spotlight.  
•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Be the 1st to Know! 365Scores helps you become an EXPERT OF THE GAME with Live Scores, Pre-Game Stats and Predictions, In-Depth Data, News Updates, Upcoming Fixtures, Lineups - and everything else you need to stay connected to your favorite players, teams, and competitions.

Join over 150 million sports fans who rely on 365Scores for real-time updates, pre-game stats and in-depth insights.

* EXTENSIVE SPORTS COVERAGE
Follow the UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, LaLiga, NBA, Wimbledon, and 2000+ competitions in 10 different types of sports, including top football, basketball, tennis events and much more – all in one live scores app.

* LIVE FOOTBALL RESULTS
Get all the latest football news and updates, right at your fingertips! Football scores from your favorite football teams, such as Real Madrid, Manchester City, Liverpool and much more!

* EXCLUSIVE iOS FEATURES
365Scores offers two powerful iOS widgets to keep you closer to the game than ever:
Home Screen Widget – Instantly view your personalized My Scores list with live and upcoming games — right on your home screen. Perfect for quick updates and easy access to the matches you care about.
Live Activities – View real-time scores directly on your home screen, even when your phone is locked.

* TEAM NEWS & STATS
No matter which team you support, 365Scores delivers everything you need: live scores, sports news, squad updates, real-time stats, league tables, transfer updates, and social media buzz.

* PRE-GAME STATS & PREDICTIONS
Get a competitive edge with our comprehensive pre-game stats, including head-to-head records, recent form, key player analysis, and expert insights. These data-driven predictions help you to prepare for each game. Stay ahead of the game with 365Scores!

* CUSTOM SPORTS SCOREBOARD
Choose your favorite teams and leagues to follow, or pick matches instantly.
Get real-time football updates whenever you need them.

* INSTANT MATCH NOTIFICATIONS
Stay updated with instant match alerts! Follow every play with our Live Match Tracker, even when you can’t watch live
Warning! Our live match notifications may be faster than your match stream!

* LIVE SPORTS CALENDAR
Check our ALL SCORES tab, the most updated multi-sport calendar that you can find.
365Scores delivers full coverage of 9 sports: Football, Basketball, Tennis, American Football, Baseball, Handball, Ice Hockey, Rugby and Volleyball - with more than 2,000 competitions, including: UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, Spanish LaLiga, German Bundesliga, Italian Serie A, AFC Champions League, NBA, NFL, NHL, MLB, Wimbledon and much more!

Be an expert of the game with 365Scores – download now and never miss a moment!

We’re always happy for any feedback!

Malaeb Yemen is the largest sports platform in Yemen. The app makes it easy to book sports fields and entertainment clubs across Yemen. You can organize open matches with other players or join public games listed in the app — all with just a few simple steps.

With Malaeb Yemen, you’ll never miss a match or result again. Follow international and global football match results and schedules easily and for free — all within the app!

If you love sports and want to enjoy playing in the right venue, Malaeb is your ideal choice. Browse a wide range of available fields in your area, view their details, features, prices, and ratings, and book the one that suits you — all with a single tap. It saves you time and effort searching for available fields and times.

If you're an amateur footballer looking for teammates, you can create a public match for others to join and form a team, or browse and join existing matches organized by other players or captains — all directly from the app.

Also, with Malaeb Yemen, you’ll never miss international match schedules or results again, as the app provides full access to global match dates, league info, and fixtures — all in one place and completely free.

app_name: 得物 - 得到美好事物
developer: Shanghai Dewu Information Group Co., Ltd.
description:
得物App是集潮流装备、潮流商品鉴别、潮流生活社区于一体的新一代潮流网购社区。 
-鉴别服务开创者- 
得物App在传统电商模式的基础上添加“鉴别服务”，实现“先鉴别，后发货”的购物流程。“多道鉴别查验工序”的平台品控，为新世代消费者带来更安心的网购体验。 
-潮流网购- 
得物App签约了数百位业内具有多年以上经验的潮流商品鉴别师。鉴别师除了是骨灰大神级Sneaker玩家和潮人，更是潮流领域的“研究人员”。通过对球鞋、服装、配饰、潮玩、数码3C、美妆等产品进行系统性研究，包括资料收集、数据对比、档案建立、样本拆解和仪器检测等，力保鉴别的准确性。还设有独立的查验环节，对存在瑕疵的商品进行排查，拦截明显瑕疵商品，针对存在微小瑕疵的商品与用户提前一对一沟通，确保用户购买到经鉴别查验为无瑕疵商品。 
• 潮流单品：得物App目前支持交易的潮流单品品类丰富。 
• 竞价模式：得物App采取商品竞价出价的平台交易模式，竞价模式提供了每个用户获得公平交易机会。 
• 商品3D全息空间：得物App采集球鞋的3D影像展示。用户浏览实现可操控式自转，720度无死角查看单品的材质、图案、纹理、设计细节，为用户打造不一样的沉浸式购物体验。 
-潮流生活社区- 
得物App致力于打造年轻人的潮流生活社区，成为中国潮流文化风向标和年轻人的发声阵地。得物App社区聚集了一众明星以及潮流圈内数百位知名KOL。我们以球鞋和时尚话题作为潮流文化的切入点，持续沉淀潮流向内容，培育潮流文化沃土。得物App社区积极拓展符合年轻人消费观的品类内容，深度挖掘年轻人处于萌芽期的兴趣点。 

了解更多得物App相关，可通过以下方式： 
官方微博：得物App 
官方抖音：得物App 
微信公众号：得物App 
微信小程序：得物App 
意见反馈：打开得物App-我-设置-反馈与建议

تطبيق كووورة الجديد أصبح متاحًا الآن!
كووورة هو التجربة الأفضل لعشّاق كرة القدم. بفضل التصميم الجديد كليًا، والنتائج الفورية، والوصول الكامل إلى شبكة أخبارنا، سيُبقيك التطبيق على اطّلاع دائم. استمتع بإحصائيات شاملة، وتحليل فني لأداء الفرق، وبيانات المواجهات المباشرة لأهم البطولات العالمية. والأفضل من ذلك — التحديثات والإشعارات الشخصية التي تمنحك التحكم الكامل بفرقك المفضّلة.
كووورة ينقلك إلى عالم كرة القدم، مقدمًا تجربة ديناميكية تحاكي أجواء يوم المباراة بكل تفاصيلها.


الميزات الرئيسية:


موجز المباريات المباشرة: تحديثات لحظية من أقوى البطولات في العالم
الجداول  والترتيب: وصول فوري إلى أحدث الجداول والترتيبات
تابع فرقك المفضلة: خصّص تجربتك من خلال إشعارات خاصة بفرقك،  ومبارياتك،  وبطولاتك المفضلة
إحصائيات موسّعة للمباريات: استعرض التشكيلات، والأحداث الرئيسية، والترتيب المباشر، والإحصائيات التفاعلية خلال المباراة
تنبيهات فورية: إشعارات مخصصة لبداية المباريات، وتسجيل الأهداف، والتشكيلات، والأخبار العاجلة والمزيد
بيانات المواجهات المباشرة: مقارنات تفاعلية لمتابعة أداء فريقك أمام منافسيه
محتوى حصري: اطّلع على أحدث المقالات، والأخبار العاجلة، والتحليلات العميقة، وآراء الخبراء حول أقوى البطولات في العالم


حمّل تطبيق كووورة الآن، ولا تفوّت أي لحظة مهما كنت في أي مكان في العالم!

Featured by Apple as 'The best app for golfers'! Join millions of golfers using 18Birdies to shoot lower scores with the help of our breakthrough game improvement tools. Get incredibly accurate distances for how far to hit every shot at courses worldwide. View 3D Green Maps to help you read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  See how far every shot you hit goes during a round and track performance & progress with a digital scorecard. You'll even get suggestions on how to improve based on how your stats compare to other golfers in your skill level. Create tournaments for groups of friends, get swing tips and share your love of golf with friends.  

Using 18Birdies is like having a Tour-level caddy and GPS rangefinder in your pocket. Play every hole like a pro with accurate “Plays Like" distances based on elevation change, wind, rain, temperature, and more.

Looking to improve your game? Upload a video of your swing to AI Coach and get instant feedback on what swing faults to focus on with custom video tips walking you through exactly how to fix those swing faults.  It's like a coach in your pocket, anytime you need swing advice AI Coach is there to help. 

Make the most out of your practice sessions with 18Birdies. Compare stats with other players in your skill level to help you figure out how to improve faster.

FREE FEATURES:

-GPS RANGEFINDER: Find your distance from anywhere on the course.
-STATS & ROUND HISTORY: Track your stats in a few taps and view all your past rounds – forever.
-HANDICAP: Track how your game is trending.
-AUTO HOLE SWITCHING: Less taps, more golfs.
-SIDE GAMES: Let us do the math and keep track of those side bets. Play 9 different games like Skins, Wolf, Dots, and Points for free!
-SOCIAL FEED: Share swing videos, talk equipment, and celebrate hole-in-ones and more with other golfers from around the world.

PREMIUM FEATURES:

*Access a FREE trial after you download the app

-3D GREEN MAPS: Read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  
-CADDY+: Get personalized distance and club recommendations based on elevation, temperature, humidity, wind data  and more.
-ADVANCED STATS: Analyze your golf game with even more charts and custom filters.
-SHOT TRACKING: Our most popular feature! Track and get a snapshot of your shots based on distance, shot shape, quality, and power.
-STROKES GAINED: With strokes gained scoring, you can find out where you are losing or gaining strokes against the field – just like the pros!

LOVE THE APP?
Rate us!

SUPPORT
Don’t see your course in our database, want to learn more about our features, or just want to share your feedback? We love hearing from you, so go ahead and shoot us an email at support@18Birdies.com – and we’ll get back to you pronto.


PAYMENT INFORMATION
In addition to our free app, we offer three types of Premium membership: Weekly, Monthly and Annual.  All subscriptions and payments are offered via in-app purchase and will be charged to your iTunes account as soon as we confirm the purchase. All subscriptions auto-renew, unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of your selected subscription duration. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, depending on the option you have selected. All subscriptions can be managed through the App Store. Note: If you upgrade to Premium before the end of your free trial, any unused portion of the trial will be forfeited. For more information, please review the 18Birdies Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions below.

NOTE
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. But 18Birdies has a low battery mode to save your battery on the course.

A free app that does not require registration for shooter, made by shooter.
Keep track of trap shooting scoresheets on your device to view stats and analyze trends.

Trap shooting, Skeet shooting, and Target shooting scores can be saved and the results automatically analyzed.
Can also manage inventory by type of ammunition.
It also comes with tools such as checking your belongings when you go out for shooting, and a round notes.

It's hard to keep a large number of score sheets on paper, but if you put them in an app, you can look back at them wherever you are, and you can bookmark your memorable rounds with comments.

Can now share your score sheet using the QR code within the app.
(This requires camera and photo permissions)
Added a scoreboard where you can also record the scores of your fellow shooters, and a scorer input function.
(For instructions on how to use it, please refer to the "?" button at the top right of the settings page)

Features:
- Reproduce the score sheet on your device.
- Enter the score by flicking.
- Automatic analysis of each score sheet.
- Viewing statistics.
- The display panel on the top screen can be freely customized.
- Inventory management table for ammunition types.
- Scorer function to keep score of your friends.
- Other tools you will need when actually going shooting.

FAQ:
- Why is it free?
   Since it is not originally for commercial purposes, it is made available for free.
   I'm thinking about running ads to cover the maintenance costs, and I'm just implementing them, but I don't have the best space to display them, so I don't have any plans to run them at the moment.

- Who is developing it and why?
   Development started using Flutter by engineers who enjoy shooting to explore technology and manage their own shooting performance.

- Where is the data stored?
   Data is only stored on your device.
   We have not built a dedicated server because of the running costs.
   That's why I chose QR codes to share data with friends.

- What are your plans for the future?
   We have more overseas users than expected, so we plan to continue updating the version regularly.

Barcelona Live is an unofficial app for football fans. With comments, blogs and chats. 

You will get every piece of information in an instant! From the latest news, LIVE scores and match analysis to calendar, results and goal notifications – all the important info for a true Barcelona fan.

Our app is free and helps you follow the team anytime and anywhere.

There is so much you can do:

√ Join the fan community and take part in heated discussions.
√ Receive breaking news.
√ Discuss confirmed transfers and rumors.
√ Try our blogging platform. You can create your own posts and publish them inside the app.
√ Adjust notifications for live scores and results, lineups, substitutions, yellow and red cards.
√ Read through match previews and tactical analysis.
√ Study post-match reports, editorial columns and opinions.
√ Watch videos. Unfortunately, we can't broadcast any live games. However, we deliver video highlights when we can, as well as players’ best performances of the season and more.
√ Find calendar and standings for all main tournaments.
√ Dive in detailed team and player statistics.
√ Share your emotions with other fans!

You can easily keep an eye on leagues and cups where the club takes part – La Liga, Champions League, Spanish Cup, friendly matches and others. 

More features will come with our next updates, so stay with us and Visca Barca!

Our application isn't the official one, it isn't created for or otherwise related to the club. It is being developed and supported by fans for other fans.

We're open for cooperation. You can contact us with any questions or suggestions at support.90live@tribuna.com.

Let's enjoy football together!
